record.description: Social Service Administration Graduates, Class of 1924. Fourth row, left to right: 1. Landesco, Milwaukee, Wisconsin (University of Chicago, 1924); 2. E. L. Kerchner, Freeport, Illinois (University of Illinois, 1920); third row: 1. Roger Freund, Evansville Indiana (1920); 2. Olive Hartley; 3. Ruth Bartlett, Chicago, Illinois (University of Chicago, 1924); 4. Marian Schaeffner; 5. Dorothy Williams; 6. Robert Markovitz, Pottstown, Pennsylvania (Bucknell University, 1923); 7. William Burke, Stirling, Colorado (University of Denver, 1916); second row: 1. Louise [Illegible Name]; 2. Marcella E. Roach, Warren, Illinois (Valparaiso University, 1921); 3. Alice Whaley; 4. Helen Meyer, Aurora Illinois (Beloit College, 1923); 5. Mary Branton; 6. Mary L. Zahrolesky, Wilkinsburg Pennsylvania (Carnegie Institute, 1921); 7. Effie E. Dorn; La Salle, Illinois (University of Chicago, 1924); first row: 1. Marian Taylor; 2. Gladys McQueen, Sedgewick , Alberta Canada (Washington State College, 1922); 3. Mary Aydelott, Perkin, Illinois, (Wellesley, 1922); 4. Amy A. Moran, Niagara, Wisconsin; 5. Elinor Nims, New Zealand (Vanier College, 1919); 6. Mrs. Wilson; 7. Dorothy Gould, Fredericktown Ohio (Oberlin College, 1923); 8. Evelyn Heacox Wilson, Oberlin, (Oberlin College, 1923).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
